ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] OT--Innorruk answers--was--Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oops, even I forgot about Dawn and LoE.  But I wouldn t include SoTM simply because if you include that tier, you re adding Justifiers, Technique, Patronas
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 15 May 2000, Rosha Unca wrote:

> Other "big" guilds include:
> Pantheon (Hi Sylly!)
> Storm
> Order of Black Staff (Hi Kenross!)
> Dawn of the Phoneix
> Lords of Eldeo
> Spirit of the Moon
>
> I am sure I left out several. There is an Asian guild that I am
> drawing a blank on at the moment. There are also a few guilds that
> do certain events together a lot (again, drawing a blank).

Oops, even I forgot about Dawn and LoE. But I wouldn't include
SoTM simply because if you include that tier, you're adding Justifiers,
Technique, Patronas Veritas, and every other small guild who has a dozen
or so 50+ people. The list should stop at the first big jump, and I think
SotM is a jump under the rest, in size.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
